description.description: A detailed explanation or purpose of the Glue catalog database.

name.description: The name of the Glue catalog database. This is a unique identifier for the database within AWS Glue.

parameters.description: A map of key-value pairs to define the parameters of the Glue catalog database. These can be additional configurations or settings.

tags.description: A map of key-value pairs for tagging the Glue catalog database. Tags are used for categorizing and organizing resources.

create_table_default_permission.description: The default permission for creating tables in the Glue catalog database.
create_table_default_permission.type: list(object({ permissions: list(string), principal: list(object({ data_lake_principal_identifier: string })) }))

federated_database.description: A list of federated databases to be created in the Glue catalog database.

target_database.description: A list of target databases to be created in the Glue catalog database.
target_database.type: list(object({ catalog_id: string, database_name: string, region: string }))
